- Follow link below for RStudio Download

[RStudio](https://www.rstudio.com/)  

![](rstudio.png)

- Choose "Download RStudio"

![](rstudio-desk.png)

- Choose "Download RStudio Desktop" (Open Source Edition)

![](rstudio-installer.png)

- If,
    - Windows OS, choose "RStudio 0.99.902 - Windows Vista/7/8/10"
    - Mac OS X, choose "RStudio 0.99.902 - Mac OS X 10.6+ (64 bit)"
    
- Choose "run" to install after download
